document_data.name: Dulkaster and Sons
document_data.members: [[Egbert Dulkaster| Egbert Dulkaster III]] and his family
document_data.mainbody:
'''Dulkaster and Sons''' was a wealthy and successful family trading organizations operating on the [[Sword Coast]] in the late 14
{{th}} century DR.
document_data.Activities: By the [[1370 DR|1370s DR]], Dulkaster and Sons has been operating a profitable business managing trade across the Sword Coast for centuries.
document_data.Base of Operations: Dulkaster and Sons' main offices were located in Waterdeep and its family members often traveled for business purposes, sometimes staying away from the main office for months at a time.
document_data.History: In [[1372 DR]], [[Egbert Dulkaster]] the Third was visiting [[Daggerford]]. While he was conducting business there he stayed at the [[Chateau Elite]].
document_data.Members: *[[Egbert Dulkaster]] the Third, the pompous rich man who appreciated wealth, and fine fashionable [[silk]] clothes ''circa'' 1372 DR.
